text: Tomb of Absalom () is a famous monument grave. According to the Jewish religion, it is the tomb of Absalom, son of King David. The monument is next to the Tomb of Zechariah monument grave in Mount of Olives Jewish Cemetery in Jerusalem. == Other websites == *Virtual Tour of Jerusalem. Offers 360-degree view from front of Absalom's Pillar. Category:Mount of Olives Category:Tombs in Jerusalem Category:1st-century BC buildings and structures
title: Tomb of Absalom
